Detailed Description

Class representing a sky object consisting of a material on a plane mesh.

void CartoonCaelum::SkyObject::setPosition ( Ogre::Vector3  vNewPos  ) 

Set the position of the object by a vector that directs the object from the origin; the mDistance variable determines the magnitude of the vector.

Parameters:
newPos directional vector.
